definition: light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object

sentences.english: That and the strange light, made Maley's face a frightening sight.
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的亮光使马礼的脸看起来很害怕。

sentences.english: Glows and grows in the murk of his brain.
sentences.chinese: 在他阴暗沉郁的脑海里闪耀亮光。

sentences.english: Grandmother appeared in the light, so mildness and kindliness.
sentences.chinese: 奶奶出现在亮光里，是那么温和，那么慈爱。

sentences.english: The sun was not yet over the land but there was a lightening in the east.
sentences.chinese: 太阳还没有从地面上升起，但是东方有一抹亮光。

sentences.english: Still no light could be seen from under the door.
sentences.chinese: 门缝还是没有亮光泄出来。

sentences.english: The light attracted a lot of insects.
And the bright light so many people claim to see?
sentences.chinese: 那很多人宣称看到的亮光又怎么解释呢？

sentences.english: Lord, Your words will be my light Through death's cold and dreary night;
sentences.chinese: 主，你的话是我亮光，带我走过死阴幽谷之夜。

sentences.english: Carry, suddenly see the wall of east top through come to a glimmer of glow-in-the-dark.
sentences.chinese: 背着背着，突然看到东边的墙壁上透过来一线亮光。

sentences.english: A steady light beaconed from the shore.
sentences.chinese: 岸上一束亮光起了航标的作用。

sentences.english: The light in the north still glimmered .
sentences.chinese: 北边的亮光仍在微微闪烁。

sentences.english: The enemy can detect the smoke and light it produces.
sentences.chinese: 敌人可侦测到火所产生的烟雾与亮光。

sentences.english: The pillow uses an LED fabric substrate below the surface to wake the user using light.
sentences.chinese: 将LED织物底板运用于枕头使用户会由于亮光醒来。

sentences.english: The baby squinted its eyes at the bright lights.
sentences.chinese: 小娃娃在亮光下眯起了眼睛。

sentences.english: Far from the alley. A ray of light, it was the street lamps.
sentences.chinese: 远远的巷子口透着一丝亮光，那是外面大街上的路灯。

sentences.english: Her eyes squinted against the brightness.

definition: silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
a glimmer/twinkling (of stars, phosphorescence, candlelight)/flickering light
